properties.entry: SELECT REPORT.REPORT_CODE , REPORT.REPORT_REASON , REPORT.REPORT_DATE , REPORT.POST_CODE , REPORT.USER_CODE , REPORT.D_LIST_CODE , DECISION_LIST.D_LIST_CODE , DECISION_LIST.D_LIST_REASON , DECISION_LIST.D_LIST_DATE , DECISION_LIST.DECISION_CODE , DECISION_LIST.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE , DECISION_LIST.ADMIN_ID FROM REPORT, DECISION_LIST WHERE REPORT.D_LIST_CODE = DECISION_LIST.D_LIST_CODE LIMIT ?,?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT, DECISION_LIST WHERE REPORT.D_LIST_CODE = DECISION_LIST.D_LIST_CODE AND DECISION_LIST.DECISION_CODE = 1

SELECT REPORT.REPORT_CODE , REPORT.REPORT_REASON , REPORT.REPORT_DATE , REPORT.POST_CODE , REPORT.USER_CODE , REPORT.D_LIST_CODE , DECISION_LIST.D_LIST_CODE , DECISION_LIST.D_LIST_REASON , DECISION_LIST.D_LIST_DATE , DECISION_LIST.DECISION_CODE , DECISION_LIST.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE , DECISION_LIST.ADMIN_ID FROM REPORT, DECISION_LIST WHERE REPORT.D_LIST_CODE = DECISION_LIST.D_LIST_CODE AND DECISION_LIST.DECISION_CODE = 1 LIMIT ?,10

SELECT A.REPORT_CODE , A.REPORT_REASON , A.REPORT_DATE , A.POST_CODE , A.USER_CODE , A.D_LIST_CODE , B.D_LIST_CODE , B.D_LIST_REASON , B.D_LIST_DATE , B.DECISION_CODE , B.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE , B.ADMIN_ID FROM REPORT A, DECISION_LIST B WHERE A.D_LIST_CODE = B.D_LIST_CODE AND A.USER_CODE LIKE '%' ? '%' LIMIT ?,10

SELECT A.REPORT_CODE , A.REPORT_REASON , A.REPORT_DATE , A.POST_CODE , A.USER_CODE , A.D_LIST_CODE , B.D_LIST_CODE , B.D_LIST_REASON , B.D_LIST_DATE , B.DECISION_CODE , B.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE , B.ADMIN_ID FROM REPORT A, DECISION_LIST B WHERE A.D_LIST_CODE = B.D_LIST_CODE AND A.POST_CODE LIKE '%' ? '%' LIMIT ?,10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT.USER_CODE LIKE '%' ? '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT.POST_CODE LIKE '%' ? '%'
